forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Partial clearing overnight. Low 4C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds overnight. Low 39F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the night. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a few snow showers in the morning. High near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a few snow showers in the morning. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
